languages.text: "Это стало самым сложным решением в нашей жизни, но мы знали, что наша дочь жива и служит вере. Пусть даже неисповедимыми и кровавыми путями, но путями, угодными Ему".

traits.locale_text: "Это стало самым сложным решением в нашей жизни, но мы знали, что наша дочь жива и служит вере. Пусть даже неисповедимыми и кровавыми путями, но путями, угодными Ему".
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Это стало самым сложным решением в нашей жизни, но мы знали, что наша дочь жива и служит вере. Пусть даже неисповедимыми и кровавыми путями, но путями, угодными Ему".

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "We knew Naaki would grow up to be a masterful weaver. And that she would accomplish great things at the side of great people. People like yourself."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "We knew Naaki would grow up to be a masterful spinner. And that she would accomplish great things at the side of great people. People like yourself."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: « Ce fut la décision la plus difficile de toute notre existence, Votre Seigneurie. Mais nous savions que notre fille était en vie et qu'elle servait la foi. Et, aussi mystérieuse et sanglante soit-elle, sa nouvelle fonction participait de Son auguste dessein. »
languages.original_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Ce fut la décision la plus difficile de toute notre existence, Votre Seigneurie. Mais nous savions que notre fille était en vie et qu'elle servait la foi. Et, aussi mystérieuse et sanglante soit-elle, sa nouvelle fonction participait de Son auguste dessein. »
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: «La más difícil de nuestra vida, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Pero sabíamos que nuestra hija seguiría con vida, sirviendo al Emperador. Y, si bien es cierto que su forma de servir era misteriosa y sangrienta, era la forma que Le satisfacía».
languages.original_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «La más difícil de nuestra vida, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Pero sabíamos que nuestra hija seguiría con vida, sirviendo al Emperador. Y, si bien es cierto que su forma de servir era misteriosa y sangrienta, era la forma que Le satisfacía».
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: 「生きてきた中で何より酷な出来事でした、陛下。ですが私達は、娘が生きて信仰に努めていることを存じていました。そして娘のお勤めが謎めいていて、血なまぐさいものであっても、それが皇帝を喜ばせると知っていたのです」
languages.original_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「生きてきた中で何より酷な出来事でした、陛下。ですが私達は、娘が生きて信仰に努めていることを存じていました。そして娘のお勤めが謎めいていて、血なまぐさいものであっても、それが皇帝を喜ばせると知っていたのです」
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: “那是我们人生中最为困难的抉择，大人，但我们很清楚，我们的女儿依然活着，依然在勤勤恳恳地侍奉帝皇。尽管她侍奉帝皇的方式既神秘、又血腥，但帝皇一定会非常满意。”
languages.original_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “那是我们人生中最为困难的抉择，大人，但我们很清楚，我们的女儿依然活着，依然在勤勤恳恳地侍奉帝皇。尽管她侍奉帝皇的方式既神秘、又血腥，但帝皇一定会非常满意。”
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: "Die schwierigste unseres Lebens, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Doch wir wussten, dass unsere Tochter lebt und dem Glauben dient. Und so mysteriös und blutig die Wege des Dienstes auch sein mögen, es waren Wege, die den Imperator erfreuten."
languages.original_text: "The most difficult one in our lives, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But we knew our daughter was alive and serving the faith. And, as mysterious and bloody as the ways of this service were, they were ways that pleased the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Die schwierigste unseres Lebens, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Doch wir wussten, dass unsere Tochter lebt und dem Glauben dient. Und so mysteriös und blutig die Wege des Dienstes auch sein mögen, es waren Wege, die den Imperator erfreuten."
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother
